name: ArtfulIdeas
0:
”Alexa, ask Artful Ideas for an idea”
”Alexa, open Artful Ideas”
”Alexa, ask Artful Ideas to repeat the last idea”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: artful ideas
des:
If you would like to draw more, or have exhausted your reserves of interesting or wacky art prompts, just ask Alexa to get you back to the drawing board, literally!

When prompted, Alexa will give you three random components to include in your masterpiece:

 – A main character, such as a doctor, a computer geek, or a puppy.
 – An object, such as a flashlight, a sandwich, or a turtle.
 – A setting, such as the city, a meadow, or a cottage.

There are many components, with more still being added.

UPDATE NEWS:

– DOUBLED the number of characters, objects, and settings!

– Politely asked a bug to leave. Somehow, it worked!

Whether or not you like or are satisfied with Artful Ideas, please leave a review. I you have an issue with it, I will never know if you don't tell me!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
